## Load data

```{r}
library(readr)
ESS <- read_csv("data/ESS/HR_comma_sep.csv")
```




## Calculate correlation between Murder and Rape

```{r}
res <- cor.test(ESS$satisfaction_level, ESS$last_evaluation)
res

```

## Reporting results

```{r}
# install.packages("report")
library(report)
report(res)
```

## Plotting

```{r}
plot(ESS$last_evaluation, ESS$satisfaction_level)


```

## Linear regressions

```{r}
m1 <- lm(satisfaction_level~last_evaluation, data=ESS)
m1
```

```{r}
summary(m1)
```

## Using the report package

```{r echo=TRUE}
report(m1)
```

## Plotting

```{r echo=TRUE}

plot(ESS$last_evaluation, ESS$satisfaction_level)
abline(m1, col = "red")

```
